description.narrative:
Ett av målen under det svenska strategisamarbetet 2021--2025 med Bolivia är att bidra till stärkt demokrati. Mer specifikt ska aktiviteter som genomförs under detta mål stärka främja demokratisk styrning, respekt för mänskliga rättigheter och rättsstatens principer.
I detta perspektiv syftar det föreliggande initiativet till att utveckla ett program till stöd för effektiv samhällsstyrning i Bolivia i syfte att stärka landets demokrati, så att det kan tillgodose alla bolivianare ett effektivt utövande och respekt för de mänskliga rättigheterna och en förstärkt ny styrningsmodell som syftar till att säkerställa social sammanhållning på olika administrativa nivåer.

One of the objectives under the 2021-2025 Swedish Strategy Cooperation with Bolivia is to contribute to democracy. More specifically, the cooperation activities to be executed under this objective must strengthen agents that promote democratic governance, respect for human rights and the principles of the rule of law. In that perspective, the present initiative aims to develop an effective governance program for Bolivia to strengthen its democracy, so the country can guarantee to all Bolivians an effective exercise and respect for human rights and an enhanced new governance model aimed to ensure social cohesion at the national and the sub-national levels. The general objective of this Effective Governance Programme is to support Bolivia in the construction of a new post-pandemic cycle, given the new political scenario after the 2020 and 2021 elections held in the country.
The idea is to develop a portfolio of solutions aimed to: i) the effective exercise of rights, ii) promote income generation based on innovative and environmentally friendly alternatives, and iii) strengthen social cohesion, through a new governance model based on inclusive and effective democratic governance arrangements.

The general objective of this Effective Governance Programme is to support Bolivia in the construction of a new post-pandemic cycle, given the new political scenario after the 2020 and 2021 elections held in the country.
The idea is to develop a portfolio of solutions aimed to: i) the effective exercise of rights, ii) promote income generation based on innovative and environmentally friendly alternatives, and iii) strengthen social cohesion, through a new governance model based on inclusive and effective democratic governance arrangements.

tag.narrative: 16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.

8.3 - Främja utvecklingsinriktad politik som stöder produktiv verksamhet, skapande av anständiga arbetstillfällen, företagande, kreativitet och innovation samt uppmuntra att mikroföretag liksom små och medelstora företag växer och blir en del av den formella ekonomin, bland annat genom tillgång till finansiella tjänster.

8.3 - Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.
